author: Meagan Flynn, Isaac Stanley-Becker
title: Kansas Gov. Laura Kelly sues GOP lawmakers for revoking her order limiting church gatherings - The Washington Post
description: Kansas Gov. Laura Kelly sues GOP lawmakers for revoking her order limiting church gatherings The Washington Post Kansas Republicans Undo Governor’s Coronavirus Order Prohibiting Large Religious Gatherings Slate Kansas governor sues GOP lawmakers who reversed …
content:
In an interview Thursday, Kelly called the vote mind-blowing.
This is a purely political move, one that I find incredibly unfortunate, she said. While the legislature as a whole has the authority to check her emergency powers, she argued, the seven-person co… [+5462 chars]
